column5: I had the pleasure of taking my kids fishing on the weekend and they were entered into a  kids catch and release fishing tournament at the state park right by my house. This was their first fishing contest. My daughter ended up finishing in 3rd place with her 13" bass. She was so excited and she received a medal! I can't wait to head up to ontario for some "real fishing" for toothy critters!   My daughter proudly displaying her bass!    Measuring the fish.    3rd Place medal!!!!!!!    My son with his big bluegill. He was sad that they didn't have a medal for big bluegills.    I was lucky enough to have some spare time so I hit the Susquehanna river.  I was able to catch this 20" smallmouth but it was really skinny. I think it must have just finished spawning.
We just had a kids fishing day here.  It,s a blast seeing the smiles.  Nice 3rd finish.
nice job representing the family, they must have had a good guide
Congrats that is what it's all about getting the kids out young.
Kids + fish+ fun = lifetime of memories
What a great report!  The smile on her face says it all.  Congrats on an awesome third place finish   Way to go!!
Thanks all! We did have a lot of fun!
So cute!! That's a great report! Thanks!
Good job and in my book I give first place for the big old bluegill.   Art
